explains: n. 炮弹；抛射体；自动推进武器
adj. 可抛射物体的；供抛射用的；（触角等）能伸出的
wordGroup: rocket projectile 火箭弹；喷气火箭
projectile motion 抛物运动；抛射体运动

sentences.en: Therefore, it is unlikely that the projectile launched was a satellite.
sentences.cn: 因此，这个发射并不像是一个卫星。

sentences.en: Avoid projectile toys, such as darts, bows and arrows, and missile-firing toys.
sentences.cn: 避免投射类的玩具，例如飞镖，弓和箭以及点燃弹射类的玩具。

sentences.en: A projectile, in other words, travels the farthest when it is launched at an Angle of 45 degrees.
sentences.cn: 换句话讲，一个做抛物体，在它的发射角度是45度的时候飞的最远。
